actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating the West Fork of the Sipsey Fork in the State of Alabama for potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

summary.text: Designates, under the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act, the West Fork of the Sipsey Fork in the State of Alabama for potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System. (Adds 16 U.S.C. 1276(28))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating the West Fork of the Sipsey Fork in the State of Alabama for potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
